name: Othello
overview: "A minute to learn, a lifetime to master." This is the motto of the game of Othello. At first place it may look easy, but you'll be surprised at how complicated it is. Othello is packed with functions: four game levels, an observation function and a replay function which allows you to review a completed game. If you're stuck, you can even have the computer make your move. Othello, the game you can challenge in your own style.
